author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Willem Janssen for "Show party names in Agreement list" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5593
In the findAgreement screen partyIdFrom and partyIdTo columns show only the ID's, not the names.
Attached to this issue a small patch that implements to show the names in the search result screen in the same way as in the findInvoices screen.
